root.name: E.T.: The Green Planet
root.description: OverviewE.T.: The Green Planet is a fantasy farming game developed by Straw Dog Studios and published by Chillingo for the iPhone and iPad platforms.GameplayE.T.: The Green Planet plays much like other farming games like Farmville and Bug Village. The player plants various seeds and waits for the plants to grow. Once fully grown the plants can be harvested.In E.T.: The Green Planet seeds can be cross-bred to create new species.
